[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thi.ng/vectors](./vectors.md) &gt; [polar3](./vectors.polar3.md)

## polar3 variable

Converts 3D cartesian vector `v` to spherical coordinates, i.e. `[r,θ,ϕ]` (angles in radians). See [cartesian](./vectors.cartesian.md) for reverse operation. If `out` is null, modifies `v` in place.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
polar3: import("@thi.ng/api").Fn2<import("./api").Vec | null, import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, import("./api").Vec>
```
